jpo
Interface GroupPopupInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CleverJTree
public interface GroupPopupInterface

This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create a GroupPopupMenu

Method Summary
 void requestAdd()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to add pictures
 void requestAddCollection()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to add a collection.
 void requestAddGroup()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to add an empty group.
 void requestConsolidateGroup()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to consolidate a group.
 void requestEditGroupNode()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to edit the Group.
 void requestEditGroupTable()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to edit the Group as a table.
 void requestFind()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to Find pictures
 void requestGroupExportFlatFile()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to export to a JAR archive.
 void requestGroupExportHtml()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to export to HTML.
 void requestGroupExportJar()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to export to a JAR archive.
 void requestGroupExportNewCollection()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to export to a new collection.
 void requestGroupRemove()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to remove a group.
 void requestMoveGroupDown()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to move a group down
 void requestMoveGroupToBottom()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to move a group down
 void requestMoveGroupToTop()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to move a group to the top.
 void requestMoveGroupUp()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to move a group up
 void requestMoveToNode(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode targetGroup)
          the implementing class must trap and do something whne the user wants to move the current group to the specified node.
 void requestSlideshow()
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to show the Group.
 void requestSort(int sortCriteria)
          the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to sort a group.

requestSort

public void requestSort(int sortCriteria)
the implementing class must trap and do something when the user wants to sort a group.

Parameters:
sortCriteria - the constant Settings.DESCRIPTION, Settings.FILM_REFERENCE, Settings.CREATION_TIME, Settings.COMMENT, Settings.PHOTOGRAPHER, Settings.COPYRIGHT_HOLDER.
